item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) RozpoczÄ™cie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[KNOWLEDGE/5 minute journal]] (10 min) Own work

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects ShareFund - A tool that helps in distributing shares in a cost-free startup. Automation House - Core technological partner in accelerating businesses with automations, nocode and code.

item.title: ShareFund
item.description: ShareFund Description A tool that helps in distributing shares in a cost-free startup. Aimed at startup founders and project creators. It responds to the needs of building projects together and instead of paying for adding value to the business each member receive a piece of a company.
